Any good horror themed dungeon starters you lot could recommend? 
<div id='comment z13rghxggke5tzpc423nidmawme5ghxzp04'>
  <h4><img src='{{site.baseurl}}//images/avatars/110285352867085036435_photo.jpg'> Andrea Serafini</h4>
      <p><cite>2016-12-30 13:28:49 (edited: 2016-12-30 13:28:49)</cite></p>
        <p>You may enjoy one of these:<br /><br /><b>Tesseract sewers</b>: body horror, the fear of being stalked and a labyrinth that twists space and time.<br /><br /><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-5jyvW2abdCbD7LWPUyyrYvjFpVLJs4EXJ0jb7dAfNc/edit" data-embed="COYCCOwCCNACCM8CCAASaGh0dHBzOi8vZG9jcy5nb29nbGUuY29tL2RvY3VtZW50L2QvMS01anl2VzJhYmRDYkQ3TFdQVXl5cll2akZwVkxKczRFWEowamI3ZEFmTmMvZWRpdD9fZXNjYXBlZF9mcmFnbWVudF89OscBCJqYmP-UKxJUaHR0cHM6Ly9kb2NzLmdvb2dsZS5jb20vZG9jdW1lbnQvZC8xLTVqeXZXMmFiZENiRDdMV1BVeXlyWXZqRnBWTEpzNEVYSjBqYjdkQWZOYy9lZGl0GmhodHRwczovL2RvY3MuZ29vZ2xlLmNvbS9kb2N1bWVudC9kLzEtNWp5dlcyYWJkQ2JEN0xXUFV5eXJZdmpGcFZMSnM0RVhKMGpiN2RBZk5jL2VkaXQ__IFdoZXJlIGluIHRoZSBzZXdlcnMgYXJlIHlvdSBub3c_IFdoaWNoIGNyZXcgb2YgU2V3ZXItRmlzaGVyIGRvIHlvdSBrbm93PyBXaHk_-aHR0cHM6Ly9zc2wuZ3N0YXRpYy5jb20vZG9jcy9kb2N1bWVudHMvaW1hZ2VzL2tpeC1mYXZpY29uNi5pY2_KC--hFoaHR0cHM6Ly9kb2NzLmdvb2dsZS5jb20vZG9jdW1lbnQvZC8xLTVqeXZXMmFiZENiRDdMV1BVeXlyWXZqRnBWTEpzNEVYSjBqYjdkQWZOYy9lZGl0P19lc2NhcGVkX2ZyYWdtZW50Xz0" data-attachment-render-hint="1" class="ot-anchor">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1-5jyvW2abdCbD7LWPUyyrYvjFpVLJs4EXJ0jb7dAfNc/edit</a><br /><br />(printer friendly edition)<br /><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WrdWXF2sYas-K3pXJOjkWOoisCJyBtgNL6RYRIFEtC4/edit" class="ot-anchor">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WrdWXF2sYas-K3pXJOjkWOoisCJyBtgNL6RYRIFEtC4/edit</a><br /><br /><b>Running from the wolves</b>: you&#39;ve broken the rules of the Good Neighbors. Now, you will pay. <br /><br /><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bKEn2jyFDAWjgGPwqw5BlLF7BEbInBe386hRhwXxbEA/edit" class="ot-anchor">https://docs.google.com/document/d/1bKEn2jyFDAWjgGPwqw5BlLF7BEbInBe386hRhwXxbEA/edit</a><br /><br /><b>Someday, this all will end</b>: the world is dead, but you still survive. It&#39;s a mix of horror, post apocalyptic and nostalgic.<br /><br /><a href="https://docs.google.com/document/d/18lXvO0YfRa4yVHuEYymzMZcpS_nGaqbCztI2USOfdL0/edit" class="ot-anchor">https://docs.google.com/document/d/18lXvO0YfRa4yVHuEYymzMZcpS_nGaqbCztI2USOfdL0/edit</a></p>
</div>
